channel.title: The Audio Temple Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Audio Temple
channel.itunes:description: Songs showcasing artists who use the Audio Temple website. Audio Temple is a recording and distribution service for musicians who want to get their music heard by as many people as possible.
channel.itunes:summary: Songs showcasing artists who use the Audio Temple website. Audio Temple is a recording and distribution service for musicians who want to get their music heard by as many people as possible.

item.title: Audio Temple | Episode 1 : Introducing Audio Temple
item.itunes:author: Oliver Southgate
item.itunes:summary: This is the first podcast to kick things off. Songs are from Oliver Southgate, Nigel Lavender, Andy Frost and Alex Southgate
item.itunes:keywords: Andy Frost vocal percussion Magnets music podcast oliver southgate get me out of here one day alex southgate radio new song nigel lavender end road

item.title: Audio Temple | Episode 2 : New artist Midwezt
item.itunes:author: Oliver Southgate
item.itunes:summary: The second podcast from Audio Temple. Songs are from Nigel Lavender, Midwezt, Oliver Southgate and Alex Southgate
item.itunes:keywords: podcast oliver southgate get me out of here midwezt ten to one alex southgate all I want nigel lavender holding out
